nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing

Interface Batcher


  • public interface Batcher
    An interface describing the batch functionality: to collect one or more particles in a batch based on a certain criteria. Particles must be added to an inner batch and maintained until the batch is ready to be sent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<DataParticleBatch> batch(DataParticle inputParticle)
      A method to add a new data particle to the inner batch.
      void init(String fieldGrouper, long startTimestamp, Map stormNativeConfig, nl.tno.storm.configuration.api.ExternalStormConfiguration externalStormConfiguration)
      Initialize the Batcher.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(String fieldGrouper,
        long startTimestamp,
        Map stormNativeConfig,
        nl.tno.storm.configuration.api.ExternalStormConfiguration externalStormConfiguration)
          throws BatcherException
        Initialize the Batcher.
        Parameters:
        fieldGrouper - When this bolt uses field grouping, the value of the field which is used for grouping, null otherwise
        startTimestamp - Timestamp of the first Particle
        stormNativeConfig - Native Storm Configuration
        externalStormConfiguration - Reference to the ExternalStormConfiguration
        Throws:
        BatcherException - When an error occurs in this Batcher

      • batch

        List<DataParticleBatch> batch(DataParticle inputParticle)
                              throws BatcherException
        A method to add a new data particle to the inner batch. If the batch(es) are ready to be processed, they can be returned as a list of one or more batches. If no batch is ready yet, null must be returned.
        Parameters:
        inputParticle - The new data particle to be added to the inner batch.
        Returns:
        Returns null to indicate the batch is not ready yet, or a list with one or more DataPatricleBatches
        Throws:
        BatcherException - When an error occurs in this Batcher
